verses.text: PEA folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘o pehē,
Ke ke tu‘utu‘uni ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o tala kiate kinautolu, Ka mou ka a‘u ki Kēnani, ko eni ‘a e fonua ‘e tō kiate kimoutolu ke tofi‘a ‘aki, ko e fonua ‘o Kēnani ‘i hono ngaahi kau‘ā.
Pea ko homou tuliki saute ‘e fai mei he Toafa ‘o Sini ‘i he tafa‘aki ‘o ‘Ītomi, pea ko homou kau‘ā saute ‘e kamata mei he taupotu hahake ‘o e Tahi Māsima;
pea ‘e takai homou kau‘ā mei he tonga ‘i he hakenga ‘o ‘Akelapimi, ‘o ‘asi atu ki Sini: pea ko hono ngata‘anga mei he saute ‘a Kētesipanea, pea ‘e ‘asi atu ki Hasaliatali, ‘o laka atu ki ‘Asimona:
pea ‘e takai ‘a e kau‘ā mei ‘Asimona ki he vai ‘o ‘Isipite, pea tū‘ulu ai ki tahi.
Pea ko homou kau‘ā lulunga ko e Tahi Lahi mo hono matāfonua: ko homou kau‘ā lulunga ia.
Pea ko eni homou kau‘ā fakatokelau, te mou kamata mei he Tahi Lahi, ‘o kinikini atu ki he mo‘unga ko Hoa:
mei he mo‘unga ko Hoa te mou kinikini atu ki he Hū‘anga ki Hēmati; kae tū‘ulu ‘a e kau‘ā ki Sētata, ‘o ‘alu atu ki Sifiloni, ‘o tū‘ulu ki Hāsali-‘einani:
ko homou kau‘ā fakatokelau ia.
Pea te mou kinikini homou kau‘ā hahake mei Hāsali-‘einani ki Sēfami:
pea ‘e hifo ‘a e kau‘ā mei Sēfami ki Līpila ‘i he potu hahake ‘o ‘Eni, pea ‘e hifo ‘a e kau‘ā, ‘o lave ki he tuliki hahake ‘o e Tahi Kineleti,
pea hifo ‘a e kau‘ā ki Soatani, ‘o tū‘ulu ki he Tahi Māsima: ko eni homou fonua, ‘a hono ngaahi kau‘ā takatakai.
Pea tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Mōsese ‘a ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē, Ko eni ‘a e fonua te mou vahe tofi‘a ai ‘i he talotalo, ‘a ia kuo fekau ‘e Sihova ke ‘atu ki he matakali ‘e hiva mo e vaeua ‘o e matakali:
he ko e matakali ‘o ha‘a Lūpeni, mo e matakali ‘o ha‘a Kata, kuo nau ma‘u honau tofi‘a ‘o faka‘ulumotu‘a, mo e vaeua foki ‘o e matakali ‘o Manase:
ko e matakali ‘e ua mo e vaeua ‘o e matakali kuo nau ma‘u honau tofi‘a ‘i he kauvai hahake ‘o Soatani-Sielikō ki he hopo‘anga la‘ā.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, ‘o pehē,
Ko eni ‘a e hingoa ‘o e tu‘unga me‘a te nau vahe tofi‘a kiate kimoutolu: ko ‘Eliesa ko e taula‘eiki, mo Siosiua ko e foha ‘o Nuni.
Pea te mou to‘o ha ‘eiki ‘e taha mei he matakali takitaha ke kau ‘i he vahe tofi‘a.
Pea ko e hingoa eni ‘o e tu‘unga me‘a: mei he matakali ‘o Siuta, ko Kēlepi ko e foha ‘o Sīfune.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a Simione, ko Sāmiuela foha ‘o ‘Amihuti.
Mei he matakali ‘o Penisimani, ko ‘Elitati foha ‘o Kisiloni.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a Tani ha ‘eiki, ko Puki foha ‘o ‘Iokeli.
Mei he hako ‘o Siosifa: mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a Manase ha ‘eiki, ko Hanieli foha ‘o ‘Ēfoti:
pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a ‘Ifalemi ha ‘eiki, ko Kemueli foha ‘o Sifitani.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a Sepulone ha ‘eiki ko ‘Elisafani foha ‘o Pa‘anaki.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a ‘Īsaka ha ‘eiki, ko Palatieli foha ‘o ‘Āsani.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a ‘Āseli ha ‘eiki, ko ‘Ahihuti foha ‘o Sēlomi.
Pea mei he matakali ‘o ha‘a Nafitalai ha ‘eiki, ko Peta-heli foha ‘o ‘Amihuti.
Ko kinautolu ia na‘e tu‘utu‘uni ‘e he ‘Eiki ke vahe tofi‘a ki ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘i he fonua ko Kēnani.
